thread.title: Jessica Biel Jokes About Pre-Gaming the Golden Globes: 'A Bad Idea?'
thread.title_full: Jessica Biel Jokes About Pre-Gaming the Golden Globes: 'A Bad Idea?'

author: Lynda Brendish
title: Jessica Biel Jokes About Pre-Gaming the Golden Globes: 'A Bad Idea?'
text: Jessica Biel Jokes About Pre-Gaming the Golden Globes: 'A Bad Idea?' by Lynda Brendish 4:53   NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images Getting red carpet ready seems to take a lot of hard work, but before the Golden Globes got under way on Sunday -- Jessica Biel proved it's also kind of a party. The Seventh Heaven alum chronicled the process on Instagram, showing her "#goldenglobeglamsquad" at work on her hair and makeup -- and having plenty of fun while they were at it. A photo posted by Jessica Biel (@jessicabiel) on Jan 8, 2017 at 1:10pm PST A photo posted by Jessica Biel (@jessicabiel) on Jan 8, 2017 at 2:40pm PST "So libations before noon were a bad idea?...#goldenglobespregame," Biel joked, captioning a heavy-lidded shot of her completed face and hair. A photo posted by Jessica Biel (@jessicabiel) on Jan 8, 2017 at 2:53pm PST Judging by the absolutely on-point look she debuted a few hours later   red carpet, in a stunning, embellished Elie Saab gown, whatever libations she indulged in were definitely a good idea. Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images The actress accompanied her husband, Justin Timberlake, who was nominated for his Trolls movie theme song, "Can't Stop the Feeling." For ET's official cheat sheet to this year's Golden Globes, take a look at the video below!
